long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get accurate daily prayer times for Bangladesh with the Bangladesh Salat Time Chrome Extension! Using real-time data from a free API, this extension provides the daily prayer times according to the Hanafi school of thought. You can stay up-to-date with the daily prayer times and never miss a prayer again.

We're also working hard to bring this extension to users all over the world, with plans to expand to other countries soon. We welcome your feedback as we continue to improve and make enhancements to the extension.

Thank you for using Bangladesh Salat Time and we hope it enhances your spiritual journey.
